Text:
Mel,

Why do you get all the praise, and I get none !!
:-))

Mel,

If I could find something else to do with my time. I would, but for now this is all that I can find to amuse me  !!

Thanks for your comments, makes up for all the ones that I don't get !!
:-))

@mac.moe 

glad to see your time is not being wasted, at the very least u're making alot of people happy, they can get away from their everyday lives for a bit thru ee

keep up the good work, :)
cheers

Mel,

I'm just surprised how many want the daily episodes. I'm not trying to steal your thunder !!

I started to upload them for a friend in Norway, and I didn't expect anyone else to want them.

I used to send her copies of the omnibus by post every week, then she discovered TPB and talk me into uploading the daily episodes. 
Now I'm stuch with doing it four times a week.

She promises that one day she will reward me fo my efforts, but I'm still waiting !!
:-))
